group_1.textLeft: ...This is the spot.
Okay, I'll do a sweep of the area...

group_1.textRight: We should stick together until@we know where the enemies are.

group_1.textLeft: But!@[chara:100500:lipSynch_0][freeze:1][chara:100500:motion_400][chara:100500:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100500:cheek_0][chara:100500:mouthOpen_1][chara:100500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:100500:lipSynch_1]Er, I mean...!
...All right...
...I'm with you.@I'll fight off any enemies that appear.

group_1.textRight: That's when you'll attack.@Do I make myself clear?

group_1.textLeft: C-crystal!
Are you looking for me, Kako Natsume?
About Felicia Mitsuki?
Well, considering what happened earlier...

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I just...want to know more about her.

group_1.textLeft: Do you really need to know more about her?@If so, why?

group_1.textRight: I can sense something inside her.@Something dark...and dangerous.
Her problems feel a lot like my own...@I just can't stop thinking about it.
I'm really worried about her!@So worried!

group_1.textLeft: Your personalities echo each other.@...Or at least, they might.
Think of your personalities as@two sides of the same coin.
But now your emotions are@butting heads with each other...
That might explain why Felicia@reacted to you the way she did.
Your feelings are influencing each other.
...Or at least it seems that way.@It's just a possibility.
But the mere possibility of that@might open some new doors...

group_1.textRight: I...don't understand any@of what you're saying, but...

group_1.textLeft: ...Perhaps it will make more sense @if I fill you in about Felicia's past.
Yes, I can tell you where her combative@spirit and emotional intensity comes from...
Her wish is at the root of everything.

group_1.textRight: So it would seem...@Let's go, Felicia!
